description.p: TarotCaster is a comprehensive tarot card reading application that combines traditional tarot wisdom with modern AI technology.

ul.li: Interactive tarot card readings
Built-in traditional card meanings and interpretations
AI-powered card interpretations for deeper insights
Support for multiple tarot decks
Clean, intuitive interface for both beginners and experienced readers

screenshot.caption: TarotCaster main interface with card spread

ul.li: Custom Spread Designer: Create and save your own custom card layouts with intuitive drag-and-drop interface
Card-specific zoom functionality: Ctrl+mouse wheel to examine card details up to 3x magnification
Optimized card rendering with pre-scaling for improved performance and image quality
Implemented OpenGL rendering for hardware-accelerated graphics performance
Enhanced golden shadow highlighting and smooth transitions between card states
Proper event handling for wheel events in card items
Optimized rendering with Qt::SmoothTransformation for high-quality card display
GPU-accelerated compositing for shadow effects and transparency
Added fallback rendering path for systems without OpenGL support
Pre-scaling system that scales card images once during loading rather than repeatedly during display
Enhanced card examination capabilities while preserving spread context
Improved accessibility with clearer card details
Significantly improved animation smoothness and overall responsiveness
Reduced CPU usage during card animations and transitions
Added the classic Tarot of Marseilles deck, sourced from Wikimedia Commons
Introduced the Zodiac spread, offering astrological insights with a 12-card layout representing each zodiac sign
Redesigned application icon with an elegant blue background and golden yellow text
Consolidated all styling into a central CSS file for consistent appearance throughout the application
Added more screenshots to better showcase the application's features
Enhanced Help menu with comprehensive sections (About, Instructions, Spreads, Custom Decks)
Implemented user-friendly deck management system with standardized directories
Automatic detection of custom decks placed in ~/.var/app/io.github.alamahant.TarotCaster/data/TarotCaster/decks/
No restart required for the application to recognize newly added decks
Improved random number generation for more authentic shuffling
Enhanced seed generation at application startup
Additional entropy collection during the shuffle process
Optimized save/load functionality for better compatibility with Flatpak sandbox environment
Updated application summary to conform with Flathub quality guidelines
Resolved issue where saved readings would display cards face-down upon loading
Fixed various minor UI inconsistencies and layout issues
